description.name: btcbavaxc
description.tagline: Bitcoin avax-c Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto avax-c-btc.b Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept Bitcoin avax-c directly on your website
Unique avax-c/btc.b receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your avax-c/btc.b wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
